item.title: Programming
item.description: Programming Bash Bash scripting. Docker-Compose Docker-Compose YAML. Dockerfile A Dockerfile is a text document that contains all the commands a user could call on the command line to assemble an image. Markdown Markdown description. MySQL MySQL description. Python Python description.

item.title: Networking
item.description: Networking It should be obvious that page is not a complete description of IP, UDP or TCP, etc! Dedicated pages go more in depth. What is “IPv4” “IPv6”? The following is the “30 second” introduction to internet protocol (IP) - which is the primary way to send packets (“datagrams”) of information from one machine to another. “IP4”, or more precisely, “IPv4” is version 4 of the Internet Protocol that describes how to send packets of information across a network from one machine to another .
